articles.title: Marchand has 2 assists to help Panthers win 4-3 in his emotional return to Boston
articles.description:
Marchand received a standing ovation when he was the last player to leave the ice after the pregame warmups, and then another when the TD Garden scoreboard played a highlight video from his time in Boston.

The post Marchand has 2 assists to help Panthers win 4-3 in his emotional return to Boston appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Conn. girl found dead was allegedly starved for weeks by mother, mother’s boyfriend
articles.description:
The girl's mother, who is facing a murder charge, allegedly told her sister that her daughter died in September of 2024 after two weeks of starvation.

The post Conn. girl found dead was allegedly starved for weeks by mother, mother’s boyfriend appeared first on Boston.com.
